description.@en: By covering your mouth with a kerchief – or a kiss – you are able to draw in deeper breaths.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch adds your [WB] to their [BB] to determine how many minutes they can hold their breath to withstand the Effects of Suffocation (or drowning). Once these minutes pass by, the Magick fades.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but they also gain a +10 Base Chance to Athletics Tests to swim.

criticalFailure.@en: As the woman places her kiss upon the unwitting, it spells their doom. Once they hold their breath, they fall unconscious from Suffocation, requiring a Kiss of Life!

reagents.@en: The kiss of a woman, placed on a kerchief or the mouth (expended)

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
